main event: A civilian reported observing a bright unidentified object in the sky for 4.5 minutes in Troy, Ohio on June 24, 1965.
interesting points: The object was visible continuously during the observation period., The object was described as very bright with sharp edges., The course of the object was towards the west., The observer noted that the object moved behind and in front of clouds at different times., The observer was 46 years old and had eyewitnesses who also saw the object.
witness description: one civilian observer and one other person, identities redacted
